Today, six Republicans had the courage to stand up to Trump and vote with Democrats to end the shutdown without spending billions on an unneeded wall. 

The ball is now in Mitch McConnell's court. He must stand up to Trump and put federal employees back to work. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1088624778704048133/img/et_tmhCWFu_sRa2P.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1088624778704048133/vid/320x320/ZLHXMyDOMhyva8DW.mp4?tag=9

Enough. Let’s re-open the government today.

I secured key funding for Florida in the legislation to reopen the government & secure the border. I hope my Democratic colleagues will choose compromise over continued obstruction to end this shutdown & put people above partisan politics.

My statement:

The ultra-rich have rigged our economy & rigged our tax rules. We need structural change. That’s why I’m proposing something brand-new: An annual wealth tax on the tippy-top 0.1%. We’d get $3 trillion in new revenue to invest in rebuilding the middle-class. Let’s make it happen. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DxuK6fjXQAA19YK.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1088613983102423040/vid/320x320/KvAemyObd7Z1Z0c5.mp4?tag=9

The government has been shut down for 34 days. Coast Guard employees, TSA workers, Forest Service firefighters, and more are waiting for Congress to act. Time to pass a clean bill, end this shutdown, and get these workers paid.

Tomorrow, federal workers will not receive a paycheck for the second time. I've heard the stories of folks who are standing in food lines and working around the clock without being paid. 

This is the height of irresponsibility. They don't want a wall. They want a paycheck.
